headline: One-on-one with Democratic US Senate candidate Conor Lamb
author: Barbara Barr
sentences: When asked how he could overcome trailing in polls and money, Lamb said, "Once people hear that I have actually beaten Republicans on their own turf three times and that no one else in this race has done that, a lot of them want to look my way."

I'm a Democrat that represents an area where there's more Republicans than Democrats, and I've been successful at that because people felt I was working hard for them and a little bit not so much ideological," Lamb said.
